fields_of_interest: Consumers, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives:
The EU legislative proposals that are of interest to Tresorit are the ones impacting users' digital rights, data protection, privacy policies, and encryption:  
General Data Protection Regulation 
Cybersecurity 
e-evidence 
ePrivacy reform 
Encryption 
Free flow of data 
Data economy 
International Data Transfers 
Legislation on Data Retention 
Telecoms Single Market
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Tresorit is a highly secure yet user-friendly file sync & sharing service. Its mission is to enable people work safely knowing that their data is secure and their privacy is respected.
